description: [Status: stable] [Name: not-in-test] [Message: Test for membership should be not in] What it does Checks for membership tests using not {element} in {collection}. Why is this bad? Testing membership with {element} not in {collection} is more readable. Example Z = not X in Y if not X.B in Y: pass Use instead: Z = X not in Y if X.B not in Y: pass
